game.name: Glamorous Winter
game.description:
The beautiful winter season has just begun and your favorite princess is seeking for a new and sexy outfit to enjoy it. Her wardrobe is full of good-looking yet comfortable winter dresses, but she is unable to decide what to put on to wear the crown of being the most glamorous girls on this planet. Finally, she has called you and hired you as her personal stylist. Would you accept this job? Join Glamorous Winter and be prepared to show her the path to the sexy looks of the winter season!

Start the fun by giving her a nice hairstyle that is available in multiple colors! Choose a boy cut hair, braid style or a long hair for her as per your wish in this HTML5 dressing game! Click the next button and the wider options of eye lenses, lipstick and handbags, headsets and warm scarves will be opened up on the screen! Dress her up with white color, blue t-shirt or a black without sleeves t-shirt and combine it with a matching overcoat and a matching pair of warm pants!

Select a pair of nice sandals or a pair of cool long boots in this cool dress-up game! Feel free to play game with or without music as per your desire! Hope your efforts will help the princess to get the desired winter look and bring some smiles on her face! Good luck to have a blast online and prove the world that you have amazing fashion sense! Many cool free girls games are available to try for free here on atmegame.com without download.
